name: TyrannosaurUs
description:
My friend Matt Bye and I created this game for the 2021 "Games Plus Jam". The theme was "You're The Best". We took this and created a small platformer about friendship in the time of the dinosaurs. It would be awesome if you could try our game out and let us know what you thought.

Made by - Nathanial Riggs and Matt Bye

Used Assets by - @ScissorMarks on twitter, Pixel Frog at https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/ , and https://trixelized.itch.io/nightfield
